newsitem.title: USA: American Bingo to buy Gold Strike.
newsitem.headline: American Bingo to buy Gold Strike.

text.p: American Bingo & Gaming Corp said on Thursday that it has agreed to acquire Gold Strike Inc, a video gaming machine operation in South Carolina, for 828,000 shares of American Bingo.
American Bingo said it expects this deal to have a "substantially accretive impact" on its financial results starting this quarter.
The deal is scheduled to close by the end of this month, American Bingo said in a statement.
Gold Strike owns and operates over 120 video gaming machines.
American Bingo operates 20 bingo centers and 15 video gaming centers.
